title: LF a beast ADC in gold/plat
body:
Alright peeps. I'll make this simple as heck.

I'm a support main, I'm better than the enemy support, but I need to prove that by having a decent ADC who can farm well, trade and have good mechanical skills. 

Voice communication is completely compulsory. Discord, TS3, Skype pref.

Minimum age is 18 please. If you're 17 and you seem cool, it'll be fine.

Leave a message below and I'll screen you and throw you a request. I don't care about your match history, I just wanna check your champions and builds and stuff. We can go straight into ranked. 

If you're a smurf, throw me a request in game, we can climb easily together. 

Cheers everyone, enjoy your day.

And if you're doing your HSC (NSW), good luck!

-Sud

replies.body: Im g5 currently, but I'm an adc main, you can trial me if you like but im keen as.
Made it to gold 2 this season but ive been trying to help a mate climb :p haha but im down
Also play a ton of midlane
hey man send me an invite I'm a beast adc but havnt been having the beast luck win winning lately

> [{quoted}](name=HAppY101,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=wQmPM88Z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-15T04:09:03.367+0000)
>
> hey man send me an invite I'm a beast adc but havnt been having the beast luck win winning lately

Sorry mate, looking for a gold/low plat.
